resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>50505</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_530</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Cuerpos de revolución</string>
            <string language="en">Solids of revolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper der Umdrehung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solides de révolution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sólidos da volta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solidi del giro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στερεά της επανάστασης</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el cálculo de áreas y volúmenes de cuerpos de revolución. Se analizan los desarrollos del cilindro y del cono, para calcular su área lateral y se estudian las fórmulas para calcular los volúmenes de cilindro, cono y esfera.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain how to calculate the surface areas and volumes of solids of revolution. It studies the nets of the cylinder and the cone in order to calculate the side area and studies how to calculate the volumes of the cylinder, cone and sphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">volumen</string>
            <string language="en">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cono</string>
            <string language="en">cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuerpos de revolución</string>
            <string language="en">solids of revolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área lateral</string>
            <string language="en">side area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cilindro</string>
            <string language="en">cylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">esfera</string>
            <string language="en">sphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, zu erklären, wie man die Flächen und die Datenträger 
der Körper der Umdrehung errechnet. Sie studiert die Netze des 
Zylinders und des Kegels, um den seitlichen Bereich zu errechnen und 
studiert, wie man die Datenträger des Zylinders, des Kegels und des 
Bereichs errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer comment calculer les superficies et les 
volumes de solides de révolution. Elle étudie les filets du 
cylindre et du cône afin de calculer la zone latérale et étudie 
comment calculer les volumes du cylindre, du cône et de la sphère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
como calcular as áreas de superfície e os volumes dos sólidos da 
volta. Estuda as redes do cilindro e do cone a fim calcular a 
área lateral e estuda como calcular os volumes do cilindro, do cone e
da esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni spiegare
come calcolare le aree ed i volumi dei solidi del giro. Studia 
le reti del cilindro e del cono per calcolare la zona laterale e 
studia come calcolare i volumi del cilindro, del cono e della sfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει πώς να υπολογίσει τις περιοχές επιφάνειας και τις
εντάσεις του ήχου των στερεών της επανάστασης. Μελετά τα 
δίχτυα του κυλίνδρου και του κώνου προκειμένου να υπολογιστούν η 
δευτερεύουσες περιοχή και οι μελέτες πώς να υπολογίσει τις 
εντάσεις του ήχου του κυλίνδρου, του κώνου και της σφαίρας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenträger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Körper der Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">seitlicher Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zylinder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cône</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solides de révolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone latérale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cylindre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">volume</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sólidos da volta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">área lateral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cilindro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
